text: @NYGovCuomo I heard doctors and nurses were frantically stripping ventilators off newly deceased covid19 patients to give to them to those in need Meanwhile you knew ventilators were stored in warehouses because they "werent needed at the time" Anyone with any symptoms should occupy masks
